lines.text: create long long ints i , j and t
lines.code: long long int i , j , t ;

lines.text: n is a new long long
a is a new array of long long integers with size n
in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive , read user input to a [ i ] on each loop
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: x is a new array of long long integers with size n filled with 0
in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive
start for loop from j = 0 to n exclusive , changing x [ i ] to x [ i ] + a [ j ] * ( ( abs ( i - j ) + abs ( j ) + abs ( i ) + abs ( i ) + abs ( j ) + abs ( j - i ) ) ) on each loop
lines.code: for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { x [ i ] += a [ j ] * ( ( abs ( i - j ) + abs ( j ) + abs ( i ) + abs ( i ) + abs ( j ) + abs ( j - i ) ) ) ; }

lines.text: sort x from index 0 to n
